SCTX - Script Source:
Scn fbmwMSAdultererTarenScript

short Adulterenabled

begin OnDeath
	SetStage fbmwMSAdulterer 120
end

begin gamemode

	if ( GetDead == 1 )
		return
	elseif GetStage fbmwMSAdulterer == 0
		return
	elseif GetStage fbmwMSAdulterer >= 150
		return
	endif

	if GetDisabled == 0
		if ( GameHour < 22 )
			if ( GameHour > 4 )
				Disable
				Return
			endif
		endif
	endif

	if ( GetDistance Player > 1000 )
		if GetDisabled == 1
			if ( GameHour > 22 ) || ( GameHour < 4 )
				Enable
				set Adulterenabled to 1
			else
				Return
			endif
		endif
	endif

	if ( Adulterenabled == 1 )
		if ( GetDistance Player > 500 )
			if ( GetDistance Player < 1024 )
				set fbmwMSAdulterer.walkstate to 1
				set Adulterenabled to 2
				SetStage fbmwMSAdulterer 20
				evp
				SetForceSneak 1
			endif
		endif
	endif 

	if ( fbmwMSAdulterer.tooclose == 0 )
		if ( fbmwMSAdulterer.walkstate > 0 )
			if ( GetDistance Player <= 500 )
				set fbmwMSAdulterer.tooclose to 1
				evp
				MessageBox, "You're too close!  Get farther away before he realizes you're following him!"
			endif
		endif
	endif

	if ( fbmwMSAdulterer.tooclose == 1 )
		if (  GetDetectionLevel Player >= 2 )
			SetForceSneak 0
			set fbmwMSAdulterer.tooclose to 2
			StartConversation Player
		else 
			if ( fbmwMSAdulterer.tooclose < 2 )
				if GetDetectionLevel Player < 2
					if GetDistance Player > 500
						set fbmwMSAdulterer.tooclose to 0
						MessageBox, "Good, he didn't see you."
					endif
				endif
			endif
		endif
	endif

	if fbmwMSAdultererDateMarker.GetDistance fbmwtarenSandoren  <= 71
		If ( GetDistance Player <= 2000 )
			set fbmwMSAdulterer.tooclose to 2
			SetForceSneak 0
			SetStage fbmwMSAdulterer 30
		endif
	endif
end
;<CSEBlock>
;<CSECaretPos> 331 </CSECaretPos>
;</CSEBlock>
